query:
SELECT 
  a.id as announcementId,
  a.title,
  a.subjectId,
  ar.id as readId
FROM announcements a
INNER JOIN subjectEnrollments se ON se.subjectId = a.subjectId
LEFT JOIN announcementReads ar ON ar.announcementId = a.id AND ar.studentId = (SELECT id FROM students WHERE registrationNumber = '2023317958' LIMIT 1)
WHERE se.studentId = (SELECT id FROM students WHERE registrationNumber = '2023317958' LIMIT 1);
